name: Yarn Basket
description:
This basket photography prop was a custom request by the talented photographer Kelley Ryden.

This is made with acrylic yarn so it can be washed and dried if needed. (you never know if a little munchkin will have an accident during the photo session)

The basket can be folded to fit in an envelope, the photographer is in charge to make it look sturdy!

Please allow 7-14 days for your order to be completed.

Thanks for shopping Just Be Happy!

The Dusty Pink is made with merino wool/bamboo yarn and it has sari silk ties.

The Creamy is made with undyed merino wool/ undyed baby alpaca yarn and it also has sari silk ties.

Due to the yarn availability, these bonnets are available on a limited basis.

name: Just Be Happy Crochet Hats for Babies and Toddlers
description:
Happy little hats for babies and toddlers!

Few things are cuter than a small child in a bright and fun hat! This book is full of such hats. From a shy mouse to a roaring lion, a delicate ladybug anda fun lizard, between the covers of this book there's the perfect hat for your little one. Make all of them or use them as starting points to create your happy little critters!

If you are new to crochet, these hats are simple enough for you to make, and they are varied also for the more seasoned crafter.

Enjoy!

Product Details:

ISBN 978-0-578-07567-9 
Copyright Alessandra Hayden (Standard Copyright License) 
Edition First Edition 
Publisher Alessandra Hayden 
Published January 28, 2011 
Language English 
Pages 47 

** PDF FILE WILL BE SENT TO YOUR PAYPAL E-MAIL WITHIN 24 HOURS FROM THE TIME PAYMENT IS RECEIVED

Patterns included:

- Bee
- Blue Bird
- Chicken
- Crab
- Ladybug
- Lion
- Lizard
- Monkey
- Mouse
- Penguin
- Pig
- Turtle

Choose between a PDF version or hard copy on the drop-down menu below.

Thanks for shopping Just Be Happy!
